name: Raylytic GmbH
goal: Raylytic is an independent imaging core lab. We analyze medical devices for clinical approval and conduct post market clinical follow-up studies on behalf of industry, research and hospitals. Our aim is to provide meaningful insight in a medical devices' performance and clinical outcome. The data we generate is reviewed by notified bodies, and government organizations, such as the US-FDA. We develop and utilize technology based on AI and machine learning to automatically asses over 100 relevant parameters from medical images in typically large patient cohorts .
euInitiatives: health care, medical devices, medical device regulation, diagnosis, AI (Artificial intelligence), clinical studies, clinical trials
